ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (And the guilty will be told:) "O sinners, separate yourselves this day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (The Lord will command), "Criminals, stand away from the others on this day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And be separated (from others) this day, O you criminals!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said): "And O you the criminals! Get you apart this Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And get aside today, O guilty ones!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now keep yourselves apart, you sinners, upon this day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But avaunt ye, O ye guilty, this day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [And God will say], "Separate yourselves from the righteous this Day, you criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And separate yourselves this Day, O ye culprits!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And ‘Get apart today, you guilty ones!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And O ye in sin! Get ye apart this Day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said): "And O you Al-Mujrimun (criminals, polytheists, sinners, disbelievers in the Islamic Monotheism, wicked evil ones, etc.)! Get you apart this Day (from the believers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (And He will say): 'Distance yourselves, O sinners, this Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But step aside today, you criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:59] And, He says: ‘Stand apart, O you sinners, on this day!, in other words, separate yourselves from the believers — [said to them] upon their mingling with the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But avaunt ye) Allah will say to them: disperse today, (0 ye guilty, this day) you who ascribed partners to Me! Thus He distinguished them from the believers.
